header.activity: Two friends talking about various topics (see 9 above) over a meal in a vegan restaurant in Rzeszow, Poland.

speaker.occupation: unemployed/ Some part-time private TEFL teacher/ Semi-retired
Teacher of English as a foreign Language

where did he think he was going to go in Afghanistan?

well he was just hoping he would just be able to evade evade evade get to Pakistan and then sort of just you know hide away or go home and hide or whatever I don't know what he expected to happen but you know the sort of months after he had vanished you know the army and all the people based in all the soldiers based in that area had to drop whatever missions they were doing to search for this one man who didn't want to be found by the American army or by the or by the Taliban and you know this is it is the same woman from the series from the previous one who is the sort of journalist and she's listening to recorded calls between the soldier and er another journalist who spoke to him at the time and they became quite close and they spoke on the phone all the time erm but she is also speaking to the Taliban via an interpreter and she is like that was just me on the phone to the Taliban so you know so at first I really didn't know if I sort of liked it because it is so different to anything I'm not really sure what the crime is or what she's investigating or trying to work out because it all seems pretty clear he left because of this because he didn't want to do it anymore and he was picked up by these people er and it was awful

and that's a general rule you don't do that and I like that

mm mm yeah but I find if I am in company if I go out for coffee or go out for a meal or something I don't want to be interrupted by text messages because I've gone out to see that person so I want to engage with their company I find it really incredibly rude erm my niece does it a lot actually you will be having a conversation and her phone goes bing and she cuts off the conversation and looks at it and I think well hello I am here we were just you were halfway through saying something and I don't think she realises she does it you know it's quite unconscious
